instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U7100: What is U7100? U7100 refers to the ISL6259 or ISL9239 charging IC on Macbooks from 2013 to the present.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.PPVBAT_G3H_CONN: What is PPVBAT_G3H_CONN? This is the where the batteryâ€™s power rail connects to the motherboard. .

threads.title: [SOLVED] <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A battery not charging
threads.message:
Another board with liquide damage,

work with charger only (tried another charge of course)

<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> 8.5V only with charger present with battery or not

diode mode pins 4 5 of J6950 without battery 0.469V pins 1235 no voltage present

<RESISTOR>R5380</RESISTOR> and <RESISTOR>R5381</RESISTOR> 2K

voltage with battery pin 6 0.6V

<SIGNAL>PPVBAT_G3H_CONN</SIGNAL> line no voltage on battery

<CHIP>U7100</CHIP> :
17/18 3.2 ohms
27/28 20 ohms

smc area and isl no liquid

<CHIP>U4430</CHIP> area and <CAPACITOR>C7130</CAPACITOR> area little liquide

error code to diagnostic PPP003 (integrated diagnostic)

threads.title: [SOLVED] <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A battery not charging
threads.message: So, dead battery.....or a short on PPVBAT.

threads.title: [SOLVED] <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A battery not charging
threads.message: I will try another battery no short on PPVBAT

threads.title: [SOLVED] <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A battery not charging
